batchgetitem.name: BatchGetItem
batchgetitem.description: Grants permission to return the attributes of one or more items from one or more tables

batchwriteitem.name: BatchWriteItem
batchwriteitem.description: Grants permission to put or delete multiple items in one or more tables

conditioncheckitem.name: ConditionCheckItem
conditioncheckitem.description: Grants permission to the ConditionCheckItem operation checks the existence of a set of attributes for the item with the given primary key

createbackup.name: CreateBackup
createbackup.description: Grants permission to create a backup for an existing table

createglobaltable.name: CreateGlobalTable
createglobaltable.description: Grants permission to create a global table from an existing table

createglobaltablewitness.name: CreateGlobalTableWitness
createglobaltablewitness.description: Grants permission to add a Witness to a Global Table

createtable.name: CreateTable
createtable.description: Grants permission to the CreateTable operation adds a new table to your account

createtablereplica.name: CreateTableReplica
createtablereplica.description: Grants permission to add a new replica table

deletebackup.name: DeleteBackup
deletebackup.description: Grants permission to delete an existing backup of a table

deleteglobaltablewitness.name: DeleteGlobalTableWitness
deleteglobaltablewitness.description: Grants permission to remove a Witness from a Global Table

deleteitem.name: DeleteItem
deleteitem.description: Grants permission to deletes a single item in a table by primary key

deleteresourcepolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
deleteresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the resource-based policy attached to the resource

deletetable.name: DeleteTable
deletetable.description: Grants permission to the DeleteTable operation which deletes a table and all of its items

deletetablereplica.name: DeleteTableReplica
deletetablereplica.description: Grants permission to delete a replica table and all of its items

describebackup.name: DescribeBackup
describebackup.description: Grants permission to describe an existing backup of a table

describecontinuousbackups.name: DescribeContinuousBackups
describecontinuousbackups.description: Grants permission to check the status of the backup restore settings on the specified table

describecontributorinsights.name: DescribeContributorInsights
describecontributorinsights.description: Grants permission to describe the contributor insights status and related details for a given table or global secondary index

describeendpoints.name: DescribeEndpoints
describeendpoints.description: Grants permission to return the regional endpoint information

describeexport.name: DescribeExport
describeexport.description: Grants permission to describe an existing Export of a table

describeglobaltable.name: DescribeGlobalTable
describeglobaltable.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified global table

describeglobaltablesettings.name: DescribeGlobalTableSettings
describeglobaltablesettings.description: Grants permission to return settings information about the specified global table

describeimport.name: DescribeImport
describeimport.description: Grants permission to describe an existing import

describekinesisstreamingdestination.name: DescribeKinesisStreamingDestination
describekinesisstreamingdestination.description: Grants permission to grant permission to describe the status of Kinesis streaming and related details for a given table

describelimits.name: DescribeLimits
describelimits.description: Grants permission to return the current provisioned-capacity limits for your AWS account in a region, both for the region as a whole and for any one DynamoDB table that you create there

describereservedcapacity.name: DescribeReservedCapacity
describereservedcapacity.description: Grants permission to describe one or more of the Reserved Capacity purchased

describereservedcapacityofferings.name: DescribeReservedCapacityOfferings
describereservedcapacityofferings.description: Grants permission to describe Reserved Capacity offerings that are available for purchase

describestream.name: DescribeStream
describestream.description: Grants permission to return information about a stream, including the current status of the stream, its Amazon Resource Name (ARN), the composition of its shards, and its corresponding DynamoDB table

describetable.name: DescribeTable
describetable.description: Grants permission to return information about the table

describetablereplicaautoscaling.name: DescribeTableReplicaAutoScaling
describetablereplicaautoscaling.description: Grants permission to describe the auto scaling settings across all replicas of the global table

describetimetolive.name: DescribeTimeToLive
describetimetolive.description: Grants permission to give a description of the Time to Live (TTL) status on the specified table

disablekinesisstreamingdestination.name: DisableKinesisStreamingDestination
disablekinesisstreamingdestination.description: Grants permission to grant permission to stop replication from the DynamoDB table to the Kinesis data stream

enablekinesisstreamingdestination.name: EnableKinesisStreamingDestination
enablekinesisstreamingdestination.description: Grants permission to grant permission to start table data replication to the specified Kinesis data stream at a timestamp chosen during the enable workflow

exporttabletopointintime.name: ExportTableToPointInTime
exporttabletopointintime.description: Grants permission to initiate an Export of a DynamoDB table to S3

getabacstatus.name: GetAbacStatus
getabacstatus.description: Grants permission to view the status of Attribute Based Access Control for the account

getitem.name: GetItem
getitem.description: Grants permission to the GetItem operation that returns a set of attributes for the item with the given primary key

getrecords.name: GetRecords
getrecords.description: Grants permission to retrieve the stream records from a given shard

getresourcepolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
getresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to view a resource-based policy for a resource

getsharditerator.name: GetShardIterator
getsharditerator.description: Grants permission to return a shard iterator

importtable.name: ImportTable
importtable.description: Grants permission to initiate an import from S3 to a DynamoDB table

listbackups.name: ListBackups
listbackups.description: Grants permission to list backups associated with the account and endpoint

listcontributorinsights.name: ListContributorInsights
listcontributorinsights.description: Grants permission to list the ContributorInsightsSummary for all tables and global secondary indexes associated with the current account and endpoint

listexports.name: ListExports
listexports.description: Grants permission to list exports associated with the account and endpoint

listglobaltables.name: ListGlobalTables
listglobaltables.description: Grants permission to list all global tables that have a replica in the specified region

listimports.name: ListImports
listimports.description: Grants permission to list imports associated with the account and endpoint

liststreams.name: ListStreams
liststreams.description: Grants permission to return an array of stream ARNs associated with the current account and endpoint

listtables.name: ListTables
listtables.description: Grants permission to return an array of table names associated with the current account and endpoint

listtagsofresource.name: ListTagsOfResource
listtagsofresource.description: Grants permission to list all tags on an Amazon DynamoDB resource

partiqldelete.name: PartiQLDelete
partiqldelete.description: Grants permission to delete a single item in a table by primary key

partiqlinsert.name: PartiQLInsert
partiqlinsert.description: Grants permission to create a new item, if an item with same primary key does not exist in the table

partiqlselect.name: PartiQLSelect
partiqlselect.description: Grants permission to read a set of attributes for items from a table or index

partiqlupdate.name: PartiQLUpdate
partiqlupdate.description: Grants permission to edit an existing item's attributes

purchasereservedcapacityofferings.name: PurchaseReservedCapacityOfferings
purchasereservedcapacityofferings.description: Grants permission to purchases reserved capacity for use with your account

putitem.name: PutItem
putitem.description: Grants permission to create a new item, or replace an old item with a new item

putresourcepolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
putresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to attach a resource-based policy to the resource

query.name: Query
query.description: Grants permission to use the primary key of a table or a secondary index to directly access items from that table or index

restoretablefromawsbackup.name: RestoreTableFromAwsBackup
restoretablefromawsbackup.description: Grants permission to create a new table from recovery point on AWS Backup

restoretablefrombackup.name: RestoreTableFromBackup
restoretablefrombackup.description: Grants permission to create a new table from an existing backup

restoretabletopointintime.name: RestoreTableToPointInTime
restoretabletopointintime.description: Grants permission to restore a table to a point in time

scan.name: Scan
scan.description: Grants permission to return one or more items and item attributes by accessing every item in a table or a secondary index

startawsbackupjob.name: StartAwsBackupJob
startawsbackupjob.description: Grants permission to create a backup on AWS Backup with advanced features enabled

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to associate a set of tags with an Amazon DynamoDB resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove the association of tags from an Amazon DynamoDB resource

updateabacstatus.name: UpdateAbacStatus
updateabacstatus.description: Grants permission to update the status of Attribute Based Access Control for the account

updatecontinuousbackups.name: UpdateContinuousBackups
updatecontinuousbackups.description: Grants permission to enable or disable continuous backups

updatecontributorinsights.name: UpdateContributorInsights
updatecontributorinsights.description: Grants permission to update the status for contributor insights for a specific table or global secondary index

updateglobaltable.name: UpdateGlobalTable
updateglobaltable.description: Grants permission to add or remove replicas in the specified global table

updateglobaltablesettings.name: UpdateGlobalTableSettings
updateglobaltablesettings.description: Grants permission to update settings of the specified global table

updateglobaltableversion.name: UpdateGlobalTableVersion
updateglobaltableversion.description: Grants permission to update version of the specified global table

updateitem.name: UpdateItem
updateitem.description: Grants permission to edit an existing item's attributes, or adds a new item to the table if it does not already exist

updatekinesisstreamingdestination.name: UpdateKinesisStreamingDestination
updatekinesisstreamingdestination.description: Grants permission to update data replication configurations for the specified Kinesis data stream

updatetable.name: UpdateTable
updatetable.description: Grants permission to modify the provisioned throughput settings, global secondary indexes, or DynamoDB Streams settings for a given table

updatetablereplicaautoscaling.name: UpdateTableReplicaAutoScaling
updatetablereplicaautoscaling.description: Grants permission to update auto scaling settings on your replica table

updatetimetolive.name: UpdateTimeToLive
updatetimetolive.description: Grants permission to enable or disable TTL for the specified table
